Description.Name: Upgraded Lounge
Description.Details: I have a few suggestions for the lounge, Commander. How does a bar sound to wet our whistles and cut the Martian dust down our gullets? Maybe a pool table? How about Holo-projection theater? Ohhh, Ohhh, maybe even a Galaxy class sound system? The Upgraded Lounge adds +2 to Crew Morale.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, in order for the crew to fully vent their frustrations and get their downtime from this rigorous schedule, we need to have an outstanding rec room!
